messages.subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News 4/17/01
messages.msgSnippet: April 17 Pioneer Press : Once Upon a Story winners and merit finalists http://www.pioneerpress.com/reprints/041701storyfile.htm Family produces three winners
messages.messageBody:
April 17
Pioneer Press : Once Upon a Story winners and merit finalists
http://www.pioneerpress.com/reprints/041701storyfile.htm
Family produces three winners in story contest.

Post-Gazette : Cyber complications
http://www.post-gazette.com/forum/20010417edcyber1.asp
Editorial on how computer charters are subsidizing homeschooling

Washington Times : Compulsory threats to education, freedom
http://www.washtimes.com/familytimes/homeschool-2001417182148.htm
Op-ed by Scott Woodruff of HSLDA

April 16
Daily Princetonian : Does our educational system make the grade?
http://news.excite.com:80/news/uw/010416/university-160
An article based on the author's thesis on homeschooling regulations.

Oklahoman : Foster earns Christian award
http://www.oklahoman.com/cgi-bin/show_article?ID=668791&TP=getarticle
Homeschooler wins High School Christian Student-Athlete All-American award.

April 14
Des Moines Register : Student schooled at home wants diploma
http://DesMoinesRegister.com/news/stories/c4780927/14386462.html
Formerly homeschooled straight-A student wants a diploma. School officials
will not grant credit for her two years of high school completed at home,
leaving her without enough credits to graduate.

April 13
ABCNEWS : Home-Educated Students Enter Universities
http://abcnews.virage.com:80/cgi-bin/visearch?user=abc&template=template.html&

query=+homeschooling
Video of ABC's homeschooling piece.

Minor mentions:

April 17
KMBC : Independence Passas Daytime Curfew
http://dailynews.yahoo.com/h/kmbc/20010417/lo/375254_1.html

April 16
Denver Post : Honduras orphanage will be Bernall's legacy
http://www.denverpost.com/Stories/0,1002,54%257E22051,00.html

LA Times : This Rivalry Is Taken to a Higher Court
http://www.latimes.com:80/sports/preps/20010416/t000032297.html

CSPAN : Homeschooled caller
http://www.geocities.com/mmoy/hsitn.html

April 15
Detroit Free Press : It's no joke: Peanuts can kill
http://www.freep.com/news/mich/legume15_20010415.htm

Ottawa Citizen : Boy pulled from creek wakes for first time
http://www.ottawacitizen.com:80/city/010415/5012440.html

St. Petersburg Times : Despite his love, dad may go to jail
http://www.sptimes.com:80/News/041501/TampaBay/Despite_his_love__dad.shtml

April 13
Frommer's : RVing Web Sites Let You Take a 'Working Vacation'
http://www.frommers.com:80/newsletters/04-13-01/article2.html

Albuquerque Journal : Local Boy a Model Child
http://www.abqjournal.com:80/news/304670news04-13-01.htm
